## WithFilesystem interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface WithFilesystem
```

## Methods

-   [fileExists(path)](./php-wasm-node.withfilesystem.fileexists.md)Checks if a file (or a directory) exists in the PHP filesystem.
-   [isDir(path)](./php-wasm-node.withfilesystem.isdir.md)Checks if a directory exists in the PHP filesystem.
-   [listFiles(path)](./php-wasm-node.withfilesystem.listfiles.md)Lists the files and directories in the given directory.
-   [mkdirTree(path)](./php-wasm-node.withfilesystem.mkdirtree.md)Recursively creates a directory with the given path in the PHP filesystem.
    For example, if the path is `/root/php/data`<!-- -->, and `/root` already exists,
    it will create the directories `/root/php` and `/root/php/data`<!-- -->.

-   [readFileAsBuffer(path)](./php-wasm-node.withfilesystem.readfileasbuffer.md)Reads a file from the PHP filesystem and returns it as an array buffer.
-   [readFileAsText(path)](./php-wasm-node.withfilesystem.readfileastext.md)Reads a file from the PHP filesystem and returns it as a string.
-   [unlink(path)](./php-wasm-node.withfilesystem.unlink.md)Removes a file from the PHP filesystem.
-   [writeFile(path, data)](./php-wasm-node.withfilesystem.writefile.md)Overwrites data in a file in the PHP filesystem.
    Creates a new file if one doesn't exist yet.
